name: Figma change cursor type feature request
description:
Illustration for a feature request to Figma team:

It would be nice to have an option, which allows Figma's user to choose cursor type for a figma file / prototype.


For example my team now is designing a tablet application. And the tablet, which it is made for (mostly used by our users) is not listed on a Figma devices list. So I want to have touch cursor, but I can't, because I have to choose "custom size" in a prototype settings, and so I only have a desktop cursor.


Also some Figma users requested to have a default desktop cursor in a Figma prototype made for iPads.
